label: How do we separate solid materials based on the size of the particles?
x:
[{"type":"text","data":"

Solid materials are separated using traditional methods like -

  • Hand picking: Separation of large sized impurities by using hands.
  • Winnowing: Separation of heavier and lighter components by wind.
  • Threshing: Separation of grains from stalks by beating.
  • Sieving: Separation of fine useful particles from big impurities by using sieve.
","posX":0,"posY":0,"bg":"","style":{}},{"type":"text","data":"

Solid materials are separated using traditional methods like -

  1. Hand picking: Separation of large sized impurities by using hands.
  2. Winnowing: Separation of heavier and lighter components by wind.
  3. Threshing: Separation of grains from stalks by beating.
  4. Sieving: Separation of fine useful particles from big impurities by using sieve.
